articles.title: Murdoch Dynasty Settled as Lachlan Takes Control of Media Empire
articles.summary: **Rupert Murdoch's** family has ended their succession battle, ensuring eldest son **Lachlan** will inherit the sprawling media portfolio after the **94-year-old** mogul's death. The legal settlement resolves years of family disputes over control of the influential global media empire.

articles.title: Trump's Net Worth Surges Three Billion Dollars After Presidential Victory
articles.summary: **Donald Trump** gained **$3 billion** in net worth over the past year, jumping **118 spots** on the **Forbes 400** list. After falling off the prestigious ranking in **2023**, his improved political prospects and presidential victory dramatically boosted his financial standing.

articles.title: Nepal Police Kill Nineteen Gen Z Protesters in Deadly Crackdown
articles.summary: **Nepal's** government forces opened fire on unarmed student protesters **Monday**, killing at least **19** young demonstrators. The deadly crackdown escalated a crisis sparked by **social media bans** and widespread **corruption** concerns, turning peaceful Gen Z protests into the nation's bloodiest civil unrest.

articles.title: European AI Startup Mistral Secures Record Breaking ASML Investment
articles.summary: French AI company **Mistral** received **‚Ç¨1.3 billion** from Dutch chip giant **ASML** in a **$2 billion** funding round. **ASML** now owns **11%** of Europe's answer to OpenAI, becoming its largest shareholder as the continent races to compete in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: US Housing Market Adds Twenty Trillion Dollars in Five Years
articles.summary: America's housing market has surged **57%** since **2020**, adding **$20 trillion** in total value according to **Zillow**. **New York** gained **$216 billion** last year while **Texas**, **Florida**, and **California** lost billions, highlighting dramatic regional disparities in property values.

articles.title: China's Unitree Robotics Plans Seven Billion Dollar IPO Valuation
articles.summary: Chinese humanoid robot maker **Unitree Robotics** is planning an IPO targeting a **50 billion yuan** (**$7 billion**) valuation. The **Zhejiang-based** startup has emerged as a global leader in AI-powered humanoid robots for industrial and service applications amid intensifying international competition.

articles.title: Drone Strike Hits Gaza Aid Flotilla Carrying Greta Thunberg
articles.summary: A **Gaza-bound** humanitarian flotilla carrying activist **Greta Thunberg** was allegedly struck by a **drone** in **Tunisian waters**, causing a fire. Witnesses report the explosion occurred next to the boat's **diesel tank**, endangering the aid mission to deliver supplies to Palestinians.

articles.title: Coldplay Kiss Cam Scandal Leads to Corporate Executive Divorce
articles.summary: **Kristin Cabot**, former HR head at **Astronomer**, filed for divorce after a viral **Coldplay concert** kiss cam video showed her embracing ex-CEO **Andy Byron**. The awkward public display at the **US concert** sparked a corporate scandal leading to both executives' resignations.

articles.title: Trump Administration Dismantles Climate Science Programs Across Federal Agencies
articles.summary: President **Donald Trump's** administration has proposed reversing environmental protections while weakening **NOAA** and climate research programs. The **EPA** announced plans to eliminate key climate regulations, undermining America's scientific capabilities as extreme weather events intensify nationwide, affecting millions of citizens.

articles.title: India Demands BRICS Address Trade Deficits as China Pushes Unity
articles.summary: **India's** External Affairs Minister **S. Jaishankar** urged **BRICS** partners to address trade imbalances with **New Delhi** during a virtual summit. India highlighted its largest deficits are with BRICS members while the bloc rallied against President **Trump's** tariffs threatening global trade.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Media empires and markets shake up today.

historicalEvents.description: Continental Congress officially names country 'United States of America'
North Korea established as communist state under Kim Il-sung
Ahmad Shah Massoud assassinated by Al-Qaeda suicide bombers
